IGModAudioChannel/EnableLooping.description: Enables or disables looping of audio channel, requires noblock flag.

IGModAudioChannel/Get3DCone.description: Returns 3D cone of the sound channel. See

IGModAudioChannel/Get3DFadeDistance.description: Returns 3D fade distances of a sound channel.

IGModAudioChannel/GetBitsPerSample.description: Retrieves the number of bits per sample of the sound channel.

IGModAudioChannel/GetFileName.description: Returns the filename for the sound channel.

IGModAudioChannel/GetLength.description: Returns the length of sound played by the sound channel.

IGModAudioChannel/GetLevel.description: Returns the right and left levels of sound played by the sound channel.

IGModAudioChannel/GetPlaybackRate.description: Returns the playback rate of the sound channel.

IGModAudioChannel/GetPos.description: Returns position of the sound channel

IGModAudioChannel/GetSamplingRate.description: Returns the sample rate for currently playing sound.

IGModAudioChannel/GetState.description: Returns the state of a sound channel

IGModAudioChannel/GetTime.description: Returns the current time of the sound channel

IGModAudioChannel/GetVolume.description: Returns volume of a sound channel

IGModAudioChannel/Is3D.description: Returns if the sound channel is in 3D mode or not.

IGModAudioChannel/IsBlockStreamed.description: Returns whether the audio stream is block streamed or not.

IGModAudioChannel/IsLooping.description: Returns if the sound channel is looping or not.

IGModAudioChannel/IsOnline.description: Returns if the sound channel is streamed from the Internet or not.

IGModAudioChannel/IsValid.description: Returns if the sound channel is valid or not.

IGModAudioChannel/Pause.description: Pauses the stream. It can be started again using

IGModAudioChannel/Set3DCone.description: Sets 3D cone of the sound channel.

IGModAudioChannel/Set3DFadeDistance.description: Sets 3D fade distances of a sound channel.

IGModAudioChannel/SetPlaybackRate.description: Sets the playback rate of the sound channel. May not work with high values for radio streams.

IGModAudioChannel/SetPos.description: Sets position of sound channel in case the sound channel has a 3d option set.

IGModAudioChannel/SetTime.description: Sets the sound channel to specified time ( Rewind to that position of the song ). Does not work on online radio streams.

IGModAudioChannel/SetVolume.description: Sets the volume of a sound channel
